description:
Toyohama Nodoka is http://anidb.net/ch94420 [Mai]`s half-sister, related through her father, a member of the idol group Sweet Palette and designated as the most fashionable within the group. Despite her flashy looks, she attends an elite all girls` high school. She`s confident and can be competitive.
Source: Official site
name: Toyohama Nodoka
